body.name: MR.SIGA Professional Microfiber Mop for Hardwood, Laminate, Tile Floor Cleaning, Stainless Steel Handle - 3 Reusable Flat Mop Pads and 1 Dirt Removal Scrubber Included
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION - Built with durable plastic and sturdy stainless steel handle, inlcudes 3 reusable microfiber cloths and 1 dirt removal scrubber, applies to all kinds of floor such as hardwood, tile, marble, laminate, vinyl, make boring chore of cleaning your floors easy and effortless.

CONVENIENT STEER - Features 360 degree maneuverable swivel head allows you mop around the stairs, furniture and table legs flexibly. 15" x 5" wide surface mop pad with improved fabric clip-on design covers more area while cleaning, makes cleaning floor fast and efficient. It' also suitable for commercial and industrial applications.

DOUBLE LOCK TELESCOPIC SYSTEM - Stainless steel adjustable handle can be extended and locked to any available position, which offers a comfortable pickup and hold for different person, makes cleaning the floor without having to bend down. Heavy duty stainless steel handle with double lock system is designed to hold the desired position firmly in its place, so you don't have to worry the pole will slide down while mopping.

DUAL ACTION MICROFIBER PAD - Our double sided microfiber cloth is reusable and machine washable, so it's environmentally friendly. Blue side is perfect for wet or drying mopping, while plush beige side works best for waxing. Microfiber mop attracts fine dust & hair effectively and absorbs waster instantly, without lint or streaks left behind, leaves your floor sparkling. If you would like to purchase extra microfiber refills, please refer to ASIN B01E40PRM2.

MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. Should you have any questions about the product or after-sale service, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for support and advice!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1. Release the handle by turning it anti-clockwise Step 2. Now the handle can be extended to your desired position Step 3. Twist the handle clockwise to fasten the position Step 4. Turn the blue plastic ring anti-clockwise to lock it.

MR.SIGA DUAL ACTION MICROFIBER CLOTH - DRY & WET MOPPING Blue microfiber side is perfect for wet or dry mopping, it traps fine dust and hair thoroughly and has great absorption, without lint or streaks left behind, providing superior cleaning experience on hardwood, laminate, marble, tile and more, so it's definitely a quick and convenient way to handle your floor cleaning needs. Moreover, they are reusable and machine washable, can be machine washed 100+ times with top load. MR.SIGA DUAL ACTION MICROFIBER CLOTH - WAXING MR.SIGA dual action microfiber cloth is designed for both mopping and waxing, the unique beige plush side works best for waxing, it's great for your floor daily care and leaves your floor sparkling. DIRT REMOVAL SCRUBBER Each package comes with 1 dirt removal scrubber which helps remove hair, debris on the microfiber cloth and scrape stubborn dirt on the floor. TELESCOPIC STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE Heavy duty stainless steel handle ensures long lasting use, can be extended and locked to any available length. Hanging hole at the top for easy storage.

POWERFUL AND THOROUGH CLEANING EFFECT Pliable yet durable plastic dots equipped on the mop head bottom increases the friction between the floor and mop plate while protects your floor from scratching, leaves no streaks and offers a fast cleanup. STURDY ALUMINUM ALLOY BASE Mop head is built with sturdy aluminum alloy base, and well wrapped with pliable yet durable plastic which won't scratch your floor or furniture. INNOVATIVE CLIP-ON DESIGN Innovative clip-on design with built in gear catches microfiber cloth firmly which allows flexibly cleaning, it's also very easy to operate even for kids and the old, simply pull it up to release and press it down to lock.

MR.SIGA Professional Microfiber Mop for Hardwood, Laminate, Tile Floor Cleaning MR.SIGA Professional Microfiber Mop Refills, Pack of 3, Size: 42cm X 23cm Telescopic Stainless Steel Handle ✓ Double Locking System ✓ 360° Rotation ✓ Reusable Microfiber Cloth ✓ Original Mop Refills Microfiber Cloth Attachment Clip-on Design Dimension Mop Head Dimension 14.7 in x 4.9 in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall, a great mop!
reviews.reviewText: I want to point out that this is my first ever product review because I usually don't care enough to submit one. I either like a product, or I find something else to replace it. I did extensive research into this type of mop, and I am very happy with the result. So happy, it led me to write this review.I have a large dog who sheds a lot, and I am stunned at the amount of hair this thing picks up even after sweeping (I tested it when I first bought it - I don't need the broom very much anymore). This mop is great at getting under furniture and is awesome for a big room. I cut my sweeping time down to 1/4 of what I was spending sweeping with a regular broom, and I don't have to worry about stirring up dust or hair into the air for it to then land back on the floor or my furniture.As far as using it as a wet mop, I saw a lot of reviews stating that people's handles were breaking within a few uses. Mine has not broken, but I think I have an idea about why this is happening. The telescoping feature of the handle allows you to fully extend the mop, but you have to be careful not to overextend it. I think what is happening is people are extending it to the very end, causing a weak point in the handle. When you use a lot of force, then the handle could break. I suggest collapsing it just a tad to make sure that there isn't a weak point in the handle. Also, I have seen complaints about the handle retracting easily while using it. Mine has done that, but it was always due to me not tightening it enough after extending it (you can twist it to make it easier to extend or retract.)I have seen other complaints that the mop flips, especially when using it as a wet mop. I have also experienced this; however, I only experienced it when the spray was drying on the floor. At that point, it wasn't cleaning anyway due to lack of cleaner, so I sprayed more cleaner on the ground and the problem was solved.One thing I don't like about this mop is that I cannot effectively use it in tight spaces, so I have resorted to sweeping or vacuuming my bathroom floor and using a regular mop to clean it. I haven't looked into it, but if they made a smaller mop head version of this just for bathrooms and other tight spaces, I would absolutely buy it. Another thing I don't like about it (along the same lines) is that it is hard to clean corners, so I usually use a broom once I'm done and get whatever corner(s) still have dirt in them. Maybe some people would be deterred by that, but it really isn't a problem. It takes seconds to do that.I have used this as a wet and dry mop many times over the last couple of months and have no complaints other than what I mentioned above. I hope this helps. This really is a great little mop. It saves time and is way easier than the traditional bucket and mop, making it a lot easier to keep up with my floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good high quality dust mop
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly, easy to put together. Came with extra mopping cloths. Great for dust and dog hair in hard to reach spots like under beds, etc. Extra large swiveling head is very helpful in the tight spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't believe I'm reviewing a mop
reviews.reviewText: Great mop. Easy to use. Sturdy. Clips hold mop cloths securely. Cloths easy to rinse and easy to wash. Can also use dry as a floor duster. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy-to-use microfiber mop and buffer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this MR. SIGA microfiber mop to use on bathroom floor tile in place of the Swiffer wet mop that I'd been using. I figured that the pole handle would be sturdier and that the fasten-on cleaning cloths would do a better job of getting into the grout area between the large tiles, rather than just skimming over the tile surface like the smooth Swiffer cloths do.But now that I've had it for a while, I find that it also works well for our rougher-surface slate flooring in the kitchen as well as our wood flooring throughout most of the house. I've even used it (with the plush side of cloth) to apply a special hardwood floor restorer to our wood floors.As expected, the stainless steel swivel pole is considerably sturdier and less wiggly than the one on my old Swiffer mop. There's a telescoping mechanism in the middle of the pole. You simply unscrew the lower part of the mechanism, twist the handle in/out to desired length, and then retwist the lower mechanism to lock. There's a plastic handle with a hanging loop.The washable and reusable cleaning cloths work well. The blue microfiber side is for wet mopping as well as dry "dusting" since the microfiber attracts dust and small particles. The opposite side of the cleaning cloth is a beige plush that I've used for applying polish or wood restoring products to my wood floors. The cleaning cloths clip in and out of the mop plate easily and machine wash/dry well.The only thing that sort of bugs me is that the cleaning cloths extend beyond the ends of the mop plate. While it's nice to have the cleaning cloths extend out a tiny amount in order to avoid scratching baseboard trim or furniture, I really think it extends out too far in that it makes it harder to put any cleaning pressure on the very edges if you're mopping along a wall.I've actually found the little included dirt removal tool to be handy for when I'm mopping particularly dirty floors (I have a very large dog who often tracks in mud to our aptly named mudroom/laundry room). While I often just rinse the cleaning cloths off in the sink, it's sometimes more convenient to dip the mop head into a bucket of hot water with cleanser. When I do that, the dirt removal tool allows me to scrape or almost "squeegee" the dirty water from the mop before touching the floor with it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Large enough to be really useful, but flat so it fits under low furniture. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed. Feels great in your hand. It is the perfect length. Cleans a large area cutting clean time down. Feels better than my swimmer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Build Quality
reviews.reviewText: I could tell immediately that the build quality was excellent. The mop has some weight to it and the tubing used is a very good gauge for the purpose used. The mop head is also a very good size and very durable. The only issue there may/may not be is the pivot point and the possibility of that giving out.

reviews.reviewText: I really like this mop it’s great as a duster as a wet mop for your floors seeing how recently I changed from carpet to hardwood and they’re easy to clean, and I like the fact that it was made in the USA

This mop worked great as a wet or dry mopWe did floors and walls. The mop heads came clean in the washing machine and were ready to go again. Easy set up, mops attach securely to mop and stay in place.
Funciona súper bien! Limpia increíble y me ahorra mucho tiempo!! Vale cada peso!!

The Siga mop handle itself is very durable, adjustable as to length and allows for 360 degree manoeuverability. The microfiber cloths are great for cleaning walls and floors of dust as it (the dust) sticks to the cloths. No lint is left behind and after you wash the cloths in the washer with detergent only (no bleach or fabric softener), they are as good as new.

Genauso einen Wischer hatte ich gesucht. Ich habe ihn erst seit heute und gleich ausprobiert. Genau das, was einige kritisieren ist das, was ich wollte: Man kann den Lappen einfach abnehmen - so kann man diesen unter fließendem Wasser säubern und wieder einsetzen. Ich mag den Dreck nicht im Haus verteilen, deshalb wische ich nicht mit Eimerwasser. Die mitgelieferten drei Lappen sind doppellagig, fühlen sich hochwertig an und sind sauber vernäht. Der schwere Stiel ist längenverstellbar und fühlt sich robust an. Die Unterseite der Wischerplatte ist mit stabilen, abgerundeten Gumminoppen überzogen. Ich vermute, dass das Wischergebnis dadurch verbessert und der Lappen zusätzlich in Position gehalten wird, so dass kein Zug auf die Klemmbügel ausgeübt wird. Das Wischergelenk ist auch praktisch, um den Wischer geschmeidig in Bögen zu bewegen. Ein tolles Teil, das hoffentlich lange hält.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recommend it. It makes mopping much easier :)
